Title: ThermSense: Smartphone-based breathing sensing platform using noncontact low-cost thermal camera
Source: Int. Conf. Affect. Comput. Intel. Interact. Workshops Demos, ACIIW
Abstract: © 2017 IEEE.The ability of sensing breathing Is becoming an increasingly important function for technology that aims at supporting both psychological and physical wellbeing. We demonstrate ThermSense, a new breathing sensing platform based on smartphone technology and low-cost thermal camera, which allows a user to measure his/her breathing pattern in a contact-free manner. With the designed key functions of Thermal Voxel Integration-based breathing estimation and respiration variability spectrogram (RVS, bi-dimensional representation of breathing dynamics), the developed platform provides scalability and flexibility for gathering respiratory physiological measurements ubiquitously. The functionality could be used for a variety of applications from stress monitoring to respiration training.
